RefParameter.Name: SelfCalibration
RefParameter.Description: Self Calibration is not available for LL configuration.

Mode.Name: Standalone-OUT-HRTIM_INP
Mode.UserName: Standalone OUT and HRTIMER Ext.Event connection

Condition.Diagnostic:
Only active when DAC channel out2 is enabled.
The non-inverting input VINP is connected internally to the dedicated DAC output.
The inverting input VINM is connected to dedicated IO pin.
The OPAMP output VOUT is connected to a dedicated IO pin.

Only active when DAC channel out1 is enabled.
The non-inverting input VINP is connected internally to the dedicated DAC output.
The inverting input VINM is connected to dedicated IO pin.
The OPAMP output VOUT is connected to a dedicated IO pin.

Mode.Name: Follower-OUT-HRTIM_INP
Mode.UserName: Follower OUT and HRTIMER Ext.Event connection

Condition.Diagnostic:
Only active when DAC channel out2 is enabled.
The non-inverting input VINP is connected internally to the dedicated DAC output.
The inverting input VINM is internally connected to the OPAMP output.
The OPAMP output VOUT is connected to a dedicated IO pin.

Only active when DAC channel out1 is enabled.
The non-inverting input VINP is connected internally to the dedicated DAC output.
The inverting input VINM is internally connected to the OPAMP output.
The OPAMP output VOUT is connected to a dedicated IO pin.

Mode.Name: PGA Not Connected-OUT-HRTIM_INP
Mode.UserName: PGA Not Connected OUT and HRTIMER Ext.Event connection

Condition.Diagnostic:
Only active when DAC channel out2 is enabled.
The non-inverting input VINP is connected internally to the dedicated DAC output.
The inverting input VINM is connected to the OPAMP output with a feedback resistors.
The OPAMP output VOUT is connected to a dedicated IO pin.

Only active when DAC channel out1 is enabled.
The non-inverting input VINP is connected internally to the dedicated DAC output.
The inverting input VINM is connected to the OPAMP output with a feedback resistors.
The OPAMP output VOUT is connected to a dedicated IO pin.

Only active when DAC channel out2 is enabled.
The non-inverting input VINP is connected internally to the dedicated DAC output.
The inverting input VINM is connected to the OPAMP output with a feedback resistors and external IO for filtering.
The OPAMP output VOUT is connected to a dedicated IO pin.

Only active when DAC channel out1 is enabled.
The non-inverting input VINP is connected internally to the dedicated DAC output.
The inverting input VINM is connected to the OPAMP output with a feedback resistors and external IO for filtering.
The OPAMP output VOUT is connected to a dedicated IO pin.

Mode.Name: PGA Connected-OUT-HRTIM_INP
Mode.UserName: PGA Connected OUT and HRTIMER Ext.Event connection

Condition.Diagnostic: Only active when TIM1 channel 6 is enabled and an OPAMP mode is selected

Mode.Name: Switching On Inverting Inputs Using The Same Pin
Switching On Inverting Inputs Using Different Pins

Condition.Diagnostic: Only active when Timer Controlled Mux is enabled and Standalone mode is selected

Mode.Name: Switching On Non Inverting Inputs Using The Same Pin
Switching On Non Inverting Inputs Using Different Pins

Condition.Diagnostic: Only active when Timer Controlled Mux is enabled
